description: Cormant Asset or Equivalent for Department of National Defence - BPM021589 SSC Cormant Asset or Equivalent for Department of National Defence - BPM021589- Amendment 000
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Entrepreneurial Ability Agreement (EAA) for SolarWinds or Equivalent for [Services Partagés Canada (SPC)](https://servicespartages.gc.ca/en) ## Title Cormant Asset or Equivalent for [Department of National Defence](https://www.canada.ca/fr/service-detection/art-histoire-quantification/contenu-expert/contre/assistance-de-la-defence-nationale-eng.ccsctionsignez-consultationserchingle?).ec Nose constrained ## Tender # Reference Number: SSC-24-00026774:T ## Publication Date and Tender Closing Date Publication Date: Friday, June 21, 2024 Tender Closing Date: Monday, July 9, 2024 14:00 local time ## Tender Status Expired ## Procuring Entity Shared Services Canada ## Overview Shared Services Canada is seeking proposals from qualified service providers for the entrepreneurial ability agreement (EAA) for SolarWinds or equivalent, to fulfill the organizational authority for data management and analytics. Some details about the procurement are as follows: * Goods and Services Classification of Canada (GSIN): N7030-ADP software * Building description: TBD * Queries, responses, and confirmation at: [buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders/SSC-24-00026774-T](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders/SSC-24-00026774-T) * Bid solicitation: Competitive - open bidding * contact: Chantal Deland, contracting officer SSC, 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2N1, (343)-551-7304, [Chantal.Deland@dissolvecc]%[contracting officer] * City of Ottawa * address line: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa
